markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dual-Weapon Reload (Gunslinger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3294) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 111</row>

**Requirements**
You are wielding two one-handed weapons, each in a different hand, one of which is a ranged weapon.

</column>

---

You carry your ammunition in a way that allows you to reload while holding two weapons. You Interact to reload a one-handed ranged weapon you're holding. Unlike most Interact actions, you don't need a free hand to reload your ranged weapon in this way.
name: Dual-Weapon Reload (Gunslinger)
requirement: You are wielding two one-handed weapons, each in a different hand, one of which is a ranged weapon.
requirement_markdown: You are wielding two one-handed weapons, each in a different hand, one of which is a ranged weapon.
